name: Stardew Valley Fair
set-up: fallFest/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Fair/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Vincent true -3 0 2 5000 3 0 2 5000/advancedMove Jas true 2 0 4 5000 -2 0 4 5000/advancedMove Marnie true -2 0 4 5000 2 0 4 5000/advancedMove Abigail true 4 6000 5 0 0 3 2 6000 0 -3 -5 0/advancedMove Robin true 0 1 1 5000 0 -2 3 5000 0 1 1 5000/animate Sebastian false true 200 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 20 22 22 23/addTemporaryActor BabyPig 32 32 65 68 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor Pig 32 32 65 70 3 false Animal/addTemporaryActor "White Chicken" 16 16 59 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor "Brown Chicken" 16 16 61 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor "White Cow" 32 32 59 72 0 false Animal/addTemporaryActor "BabyWhite Cow" 32 32 61 72 1 false Animal/advancedMove BabyPig true 0 1 3 5000 0 -1 0 7000/advancedMove Pig true 3 5000 0 1 1 5000 0 -1 3 5000/advancedMove White_Chicken true 1 0 2 7000 -1 0 2 10000/animate "Brown Chicken" false true 500 16 17/playerControl fair/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
Abigail_spouse: I beat all these games last year!$h
Leah_spouse: I learned all of Robin's techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me!
Maru_spouse: mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.
Penny_spouse: I hope we win the grange display contest!
Haley_spouse: Did you remember to bring good stuff for our grange display? I hope we win this year.
Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.
Sam_spouse: Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Alex_spouse: I'm just catching up with some old friends... you go on and have a good time.
Harvey_spouse: I'll wait here until you're ready to go home...
Elliott_spouse: The smokey aroma drew me here, yet 'twas the zesty sauce that truly sealed my fate... *gurgle*$s
Abigail: I already beat all the games... now what?
Robin: Woodworking is an ancient tradition that I'm very proud to be a part of.$h
Demetrius: Robin really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
Maru: *slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing.$h
Sebastian: It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.
Pierre: My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!
Caroline: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Linus: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.
Alex: I played the 'Strength' game too many times and now my arms feel like rubber.
George: Hmm... smoked turkey haunch? I guess this festival isn't all bad.$h
Evelyn: I wish Gus would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchini skewers, maybe?
Lewis: Well @, it's the big day... Our most important festival of the year, the 'Stardew Valley Fair'.#$b#If you'd like to participate by setting up a grange display, I've left an empty stand for you. Just let me know after you've set everything up so we can get to the judging.
Clint: I complain about my job sometimes, but I do take pride in my work.#$b#These are some of my finest pieces. I hope you like them.
Emily: You know, I would've made a pretty good clown. I think I missed my calling.
Penny: I won the wheel of chance ten times in a row and now the man won't let me play anymore...$s
Pam: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' Pam here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.$h
Haley: Have you been to the fortune teller? She set up her stand in the graveyard.#$e#I already saw her... she told me something... interesting. *giggle*$h
Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor Lewis had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Kent: I'm waiting for this clown to start doing something funny.#$e#Pretty disappointing.
Sam: Hey @. Having a good time?#$e#The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.
Leah: I really admire Robin's carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own line of work.
Shane: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.
Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Pierre's.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Elliott: I'm trying to get Gus to tell me his sauce recipe, but he won't budge.
Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.#$e#...#$e#That clown... I know him from somewhere.#$e#Was it the school of illusion? Or maybe the Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...
Harvey: And just a few steps over there, Gus is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Jas: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!$u
Marlon: Clint's blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do his prices...
Willy: Are you setting up a grange display, @? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from %farm!
Leo: Haha! I've never seen anything like this before...$h

Abigail_spouse_y2: Aren't these weapons cool? I might have to bring one of these home with us today.$0
Leah_spouse_y2: Hey, Robin is teaching me some innovative techniques this year.#$e#I'll have to show you later...$1
Maru_spouse_y2: I hope we win the grange display contest! You worked really hard this year.
Penny_spouse_y2: Come here, sit for a while! There's space on the bench for the both of us.$1
Haley_spouse_y2: It's a little funny seeing Alex stuff his face. He seems to be doing well.#$e#I hope we win the grange display contest this year!$1
Emily_spouse_y2: Sandy traveled all the way from Calico Desert to be here today.#$b#It's not very often that I get to see her!
Sebastian_spouse_y2: That lady in the graveyard predicted our future...$0#$b#Apparently, we're destined to live a happy life together.$1
Sam_spouse_y2: Hey, are you enjoying the festival? I'll be rooting for our grange display!$0#$e#Psst... If you're going to bet your tokens on the wheel... bet on green!$0
Alex_spouse_y2: Did you eat yet? There's almost too much to go around!$0#$e#I already ate three sandwiches... Mmm... that sauce...
Harvey_spouse_y2: Hi, honey. Good luck today in the competition. I just know you're going to shine!$0
Elliott_spouse_y2: Victory! I achieved a score of '216' with five fish caught... a new personal best!$1#$e#Now, I must choose a fitting prize to purchase for you with these star tokens...$0
Shane_spouse_y2: I might ask you to watch the animals soon so I can grab some food.$0
Abigail_y2: This blade is so elegant. Maybe some day I'll have enough money to buy one!$0
Robin_y2: If you want to master the wood, you have to think like a tree...$0
Demetrius_y2: Sheep have remarkable memory capabilities... retaining familiarity with both fellow sheep and humans...$0#$e#They even form friendships, mirroring the close bonds we humans cultivate with one another!$1
Maru_y2: There's so much to do! I don't know where to begin.$0
Sebastian_y2: That lady told me my fortune. I don't know what to make of it...$0
Linus_y2: Animals are kind of like little people... they also have feelings and emotions.$0
Pierre_y2: I'm confident that I'll emerge victorious in this year's grange display competition!$1
Caroline_y2: Some of the produce in our grange display came from my little greenhouse. We've been carefully growing this stuff all year!$0
Alex_y2: Every hundred rounds of the strength game I win, I eat another BBQ sandwich.$0
George_y2: %George is on the verge of falling asleep.
Evelyn_y2: Hee hee... Maybe I should start a collection of clown figurines...
Lewis_y2: Greetings, @! The 'Stardew Valley Fair' is finally here and the crowd is growing by the minute.#$b#Just like last year, I've set up an empty grange display for you. Speak with me when you're ready to commence the judging.
Clint_y2: It's heartening to see others take an interest in my work. Makes me feel like I'm doing something good in the world.#$e#I finished some of these pieces just last week. Please inspect them closely, I stand behind my work!
Penny_y2: *phew* After being on my feet all day, it's nice to finally take a moment to relax.$0
Pam_y2: Life don't get much better than this, kid!$1
Emily_y2: When Sandy and I were kids, we joked about running away from it all and joining the circus.$0#$e#I don't think we would've actually gone through with it, but it's fun to imagine.$1
Haley_y2: I'm trying to maintain a diet this fall... but I can't resist these juicy burgers!$h
Jodi_y2: Oh no. Who's responsible for littering here?$2#$e#Every year we get some tourists that don't respect our town...$2
Kent_y2: *chuckle* My son has a knack for accuracy. I wonder if he got it from me.$1
Marlon_y2: I'm in the market for a new weapon. I wonder if I could negotiate a trade with Clint...
Sam_y2: Ugh... I gambled and lost it all to the spinning wheel...$2#$e#I should've went with green.$0
Leah_y2: I think Robin and I make a pretty good team, don't you think?
Shane_y2: The animals have been given their favorite foods, so they're happy.$h#$e#Feel free to pet them, they won't bite.
Marnie_y2: My animals had a successful year! I'm hoping the high-quality produce will impress the judges.$1#$e#How's your grange display, @? It's your moment to showcase the fruits of your labor.$0
Elliott_y2: Ah, don't mind the smell... I just emerged from the fishing booth with a sizable haul!$1#$e#Now, I must decide what to do with all these star tokens...$0
Gus_y2: Working four grills simultaneously is hard work! There's a large and hungry crowd to cater to today.$0#$e#I put a little dash of my zesty sauce in each patty. *wink*
Dwarf_y2: I was curious about this human gathering... $0#$e#Please don't tell anyone. I'm hoping to remain hidden here...$0
Wizard_y2: If you wish to peer through the mists of tomorrow, speak to my colleague Welwick.$0#$b#She has an uncommon gift...#$e#That young man by the tree seemed intrigued by his reading, but even with my powers, I cannot probe the innermost secrets of the heart...$0
Harvey_y2: I'm astonished by the level of craftsmanship on display here. Some people are so talented!$0
Sandy_y2: The Stardew Valley community is truly one-of-a-kind...$0
Jas_y2: Mooo! Moooooo!$1#$e#I'm trying to talk to the baby cows.$0
Vincent_y2: Can I play the slingshot game again, Dad!? Please?$0
Willy_y2: I managed to catch several iridium-quality beauties, just in time for this year's fair!$1#$e#After our grange displays are judged I'll have to try my hand at the fishing game tent.$0
Leo_y2: I'm making friends with these birds!$1
